Module AudioNode

Module Summary
AudioNode The audioNode module is a comprehensive audio analysis toolkit, performing file reading, audio sampling, and Fourier analysis. The “black box” simply receives an audio file and produces a real-time banded FFT. Detailed description of this module can be found in the plugin's documentation.
 

Attributes Summary
Required Node State, In Time, File Path, Bands Number, Amp Scale, Amp Response, Fft Scaling, Offset, Samples Number
